Package xtc.lang.blink.agent

Interface Summary
AgentCommandOptions The Blink Agent's constant values visible to the Blink through the Java component debugger.
AgentJavaDeclaration The Blink Agent's constant values visible to the Blink through the Java component debugger.
AgentNativeDeclaration The Blink Agent's constant values visible to the Blink through the Java component debugger.
JNIConstants  
 

Class Summary
AgentVariable The Blink support for the convenience variables in the Java debugger.
GenerateHardcodedJavaClass A hard coded Java class generator.
GenerateJNIFunctionProxy A JNI Function proxy generator.
JNIType 9 primitives types: jboolean, jbyte, jchar, jshort, jint, jlong, jfloat, jdouble, jsize 15 reference types: jobject, jclass, jstring, jarray, jbooleanArray, jbyteArray, jcharArray, jshortArray, jintArray, jlongArray, jfloatArray, jdoubleArray, jobjectArray, jthrowable, jweak 2 identifiers:jmethodID and jfieldID 6 UTF-8 C string (const char*) + generic string message + method name + field name + class descriptors (e.g., "java/lang/String") + field descriptors (e.g., "Ljava/lang/String;") + method descriptors (e.g., "()Ljava/lang/String;" Unknown
